summary: A blind girl gets a cornea transplant so that she would be able to see again. However, she got more than what she bargained for when she realized she could even see ghosts.
cast: Angelica Lee|Lawrence Chou|Jinda Duangtoy|Yut Lai So|Candy Lo|Edmund Chen|Yin Ping Ko|Florence Wu|Wisarup Annuar|Yuet Siu Wong|Wing-Wai Chin|Tao Leung|Mylio Lau|Ousinthorn Chotphan|Dampongongtrakul Sawadee|Ming Poon|Ben Yuen|Wasarat Thrasarchoti|Cub Chien|Nonlaporn Sombatruksasuk|Tian Nan Wu|Nittaya Suthornrat|Hing Kim Lee|Si Won Ho|Yuk Ha Lau|Pui-Ho Chim|Sungwen Cummee|Chutcha Rujinanon|Somchai Leelanukul|Busarn Thongtiw|Panpimol Jeamsakol|Pierre Png|Sue Yuen Wang|Tassanana Nuntasapee|Damrongwiseeatpanich|Sopol Duriensuk|Pornchai Hongrattanaporn|Wirasinee Kuntipan|Narongsak Junjiamrat|Kanta Aeamsamang|Vuanna Mahachanok|King-Man Yip|Wai-Ho Yung
director: Directors: Danny Pang (as Pang Brothers), Oxide Chun Pang (as Pang Brothers)
title: The Eye
